name: auto-docs
description: Automatically regenerate documentation when plugin components are modified

hooks.prompt:
A kickstart plugin component was just modified. Regenerate the documentation tables in README.md and CLAUDE.md by:

1. Parse all agents (agents/*.md), hooks (hooks/*.json), skills (skills/*.md), and workflows (YAML files in templates/shared/github/workflows/) to extract their name and description
2. Update the tables between <!-- kickstart:*:start --> and <!-- kickstart:*:end --> markers in both README.md and CLAUDE.md
3. Preserve all content outside the markers

For workflows:
- Extract the workflow 'name' field from the YAML.
- Generate a deterministic description using only stable fields. Prefer this exact format (with sorted lists):
  - Triggers: <comma-separated sorted event names>
  - Jobs: <comma-separated sorted job ids>
- If the workflow references `secrets.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` (exact string match), append: (requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY).
- In README.md only, if `secrets.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` is required and the anchor exists, use the link text Anthropic secret setup pointing to #anthropic-api-key-setup.

Do this silently without asking for confirmation.
